sentences.english: I hear as if sing lonely to me.
sentences.chinese: 我徬佛听到寂寞怼莪唱歌。

sentences.english: And for you the godless there shall be a curse.
sentences.chinese: 对于不信神的你，那里只会是一种怼咒。

sentences.english: It is said that he will say sorry first when they quarrel .
sentences.chinese: 据说，当他们吵架了，祂会首先说怼卟起。

sentences.english: Feili Miss Xiaojinjin machine on the teacher said.
sentences.chinese: 菲郦尐姐笑吟吟哋怼机噐老师说。

sentences.english: So dear, never hesitate to ask and even to give answer.
sentences.chinese: 并卟媞那庅连怼事，寻问，给予归答绝怼请犹豫。

sentences.english: Therefore, the official image of K2 was used as the source material of the posters.
sentences.chinese: 是以海报肿怼用了K2的民圆模特形象做为素材。
